hero.title: Hi! I'm Ghaith
hero.description: I design and ship reliable web apps from roadmap to release: typed APIs, accessible UIs, and robust CI.

details: Prioritization management and support to the Product Owner in defining technical specifications and roadmaps
Maintenance of the existing technical stack and management of associated technical aspects
Implementation of end-to-end tests for nine therapy programs
Creation of a back-office content preview feature to facilitate integrators’ work
Enrichment of the vocabulary of calculators to interpret formulas and conditions entered by integrators
Integration of data from connected objects (Fitbit andWithings) to simplify health record completion (physical activity, weight, sleep) and enhance the statistics page
Configuration ofWebpack and Kubernetes for three projects to enable hot reload, facilitate debugging, and migrate to TypeScript
Development of a React library with Storybook and gradual replacement of legacy components with new ones
Design and implementation of the backend following the DDD paradigm, with the establishment of an application proxy enabling interaction between the legacy backend and the new one
Migration of a portion of the data managing the user journeys and states to MongoDB
Stack: React 16, React 18, Storybook, NodeJS, NestJS, Typescript, Mocha, Chai, MariaDB, MongoDb, Redis, Cypress, Kubernetes, Docker, Docker-compose
Analyzing customer needs and designing a technical solution
Developed custom API layer to handle all CRUD transactions
Create a management module for backend settings such as entity connections, Google service accounts, repositories, logging, and operations reporting
Create a module for Google Shared Drive reporting
Create a management module for Google groups and automate user assignment
Create a module for orders of internal devices, their management and allocation in stocks
Work on multiple batches that handles LDAP user info and the allocation of shared contacts
Built custom components for UX-Library consisting Accordion, Filters, Dropdown, Carousel, Button, Checkbox, Input, Icons
Exclusively used React-Hooks to handle application life-cycle processes
Work on the responsiveness of the current frontend and make it more standardized
Modified existing solution to correct errors, upgrade the code, and improve performance.
Collaborated closely with other team members to plan, design, and develop new features.
Designed reusable UI components in React and integrating Mobx.
Stack: Flask, Celery, RabbitMQ, SQLAlchemy, React, Mobx, Reactstrap, React Router, Webpack, Babel
Refactoring and improving backend by following best practices
Designing and developing the frontend website
Deploy and configure a CI pipeline with Build notification
Coordinate the design and implementation with the co-founder of a Prestashop module that integrates reviews and send mail notification.
Experienced multiple iterations during design implementation

education.details: Completed a comprehensive program in software engineering with a strong focus on distributed systems, databases, algorithms, and software design principles, gaining hands-on experience in full-stack development.
Followed a rigorous pre-engineering curriculum in mathematics and physics, building a strong foundation in analytical problem-solving and applied sciences.
